refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the name of the current element

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
DomElement
stringtagname
Returns the name of the current node. Calling this function is the same as accessing the tagname property, or calling on the current node.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the name of the current DomElement node.

refsect1.title: Migrating to PHP 5
refsect1.para: Use the tagName property of the DOMElement object.
